summary: This is a HDT Tail for the 3 MaTera Races from Charismoon. Works with Female and Male Character
descriptionHtml:
[center][size=3]Hi everyone this i my first Mod ever :)[/size]

!! A little Update to the Tail hope with this the stretching Bug is gone !! 
!! The Installer got a Update so please read the info in the Installation Instrustions !!
!! When i was looking at the Animations i found out that the Bow Animation is missing you can find a link under Optional Files !!
 
[size=4][color=#e69138]So first of all what is this Mod:[/color]
[/size][size=3]This Mod adds HDT Tails for the three Custom Races 
Matera
Battle Matera
Magic Matera[/size]
[youtube]ecOfCmf2u_g[/youtube]
When i played the Race i thought it would be nice if the Tail would work with physics,
so i did start working on it and ended up with more work then i thought :)

[color=#e69138][size=5]Dependencies:[/size][/color]
At least one of the MaTera Races found here:
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/23170/?]MaTera[/url]﻿[/center][center][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/26642/?]Battle MaTera[/url]﻿
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/30673/?]Magic MaTera[/url]﻿

[color=#ff0000][size=3]!!For the Race requirements follow Charismoons instructions!!
[/size][/color]
SKSE found here: [url=http://skse.silverlock.org/]http://skse.silverlock.org/[/url]﻿
[b]HDT Physics Extension: [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/53996/?][b]http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/53996/?[/b][/url]﻿[/b][b]
Fores New Idles in Skyrim: [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/11811/? ][b]http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/11811/? [/b][/url]﻿

[color=#e69138][size=5]Installation:[/size][/color]
[/b][size=3]First Install SKSE and [b]HDT Physics Extension.
[/b]Then one of the Races.[/size]

Easy Install:
[size=3]Use NMM and chose the Race you installed and the Skeleton you want.
Override all files and run FNIS at the end youre done.[/size]


[size=4][color=#ff0000] !! There was a update to the Installer you can chose the Skeleton but it doesnt Install all Files anymore !!
!! Whats gone are the Animations, Bolt choses, RaceMenuPluginXPMSE.esp and the installation of the Skeleton to the normal Places !!
!! I did this because if Groovtama makes a update to his Skeleton and you install my Mod afterwards it can give weird issues !!
!! So if you are using Swords on the Back you need to istall Groovtamas Skeleton or the Animation for it !! 
!! and if you want the RACEMENUPLUGINXPMSE.esp then you need to install Groovtamas skeleton !![/color][/size]


Manual:
After you installed one of the Races:
Download and unzip the File anywhere you want.
Go to the Folder and copy the Content from one of the Race Folders in the Skyrim Data Folder.
Copy the the Content from SKSE folder to youre own.
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/26800/?tab=2&navtag=http%3A%2F%2Fwww.nexusmods.com%2Fskyrim%2Fajax%2Fmodfiles%2F%3Fid%3D26800&pUp=1]Install Groovtamas Skeleton[/url]﻿ or any Skeleton you want to use but it needs to be HDT capable. 
Go to youre Skyrim folder:
Now it depends on what you play Male or Female.
For Male: 
Data\Meshes\Actors\Character\character assets
For Female:
Data\Meshes\Actors\Character\character assets female
Copy the skeleton.nif or skeleton_female.nif and skeletonbeast.nif or skeletonbeast_female.nif.
Go back to Data\Meshes\Actors\Character there is then a Folder named MaTera/BMaTera or MMaTera.
Now it depends again on what you play.
If you play MaTera its:
MaTera\female or male\body override the skeletons in there.
same for Battle and Magic MaTera.
Run FNIS and youre done.


[color=#e69138][size=4]Optional Files:
[/size][/color]Animations:
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/35717/?tab=2&navtag=http%3A%2F%2Fwww.nexusmods.com%2Fskyrim%2Fajax%2Fmodfiles%2F%3Fid%3D35717&pUp=1]Cheskos Bow Animation[/url]﻿
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/38078/?tab=2&navtag=http%3A%2F%2Fwww.nexusmods.com%2Fskyrim%2Fajax%2Fmodfiles%2F%3Fid%3D38078&pUp=1]1h Sword Back[/url]﻿


[size=4][color=#e69138]BUGS:[/color]
[/size]There are 3 i know of:
The Tail quivers a little bit when standing.
Sometimes the Tail cant keep up with the Movement and stretches but if you stop i goes back to its Position.
The Tail stops working its really Rar happend to me only ones. 
If you find more PM i try to get it fixed.

Mod is Approved from Charismoon :)
[url=http://imageshack.com/f/p8hb4Rjrp][img]http://imagizer.imageshack.us/v2/150x100q90/908/hb4Rjr.png[/img]

[/url][size=4][color=#e69138]Credits:[/color]
[/size]Thanks Charismoon for your permission and awesome Race.
Thanks Groovtama that i can use your Skeleton. [/center]
author: deadzone45
